description: This file is the entry point for a React-based frontend application. It imports React and ReactDOM modules, applies global styles with './index.css', and renders the main App component inside a root DOM node identified by 'root'. It initializes the React rendering process with ReactDOM's createRoot API, wrapped in React.StrictMode for highlighting potential issues.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root React node for rendering the React component tree.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component into the specified DOM node.
